sentences.sContent: Married at nineteen, she was a traditional housewife and mother of four children.
sentences.sCn: 她19岁就结婚了，是个传统的家庭主妇和4个孩子的母亲。

sentences.sContent: ...There is even a saying that "even a clever housewife cannot cook a meal without rice"...

trans.tranOther: a married woman who works at home doing the cooking, cleaning etc, but does not have a job outside the house
